event.title: Radio interview with Karin Kosina
event.body:
On Friday 20 May 2005 at 21:00 CEST, Karin Kosina talks about the FSFE and the Fellowship in Vienna's local radio station "Radio Orange".
Radio Orange can be received in Vienna on FM 94.0 MHz. For the rest of the world, a live stream is available under http://www.orange.or.at/live.
